Package model

Class Language

java.lang.Object
model.Language
public class Language
extends java.lang.Object
The purpose of this class is to set the language and the country of the application for localization purposes. This class will change the locale of the application during runtime. This is used to provide the applications elements with the equivalent language package.
Author:
Kalle, Jani

    • saveLocale

      public void saveLocale​(java.lang.String language, java.lang.String country)
      Saving the locale in a way that the application remembers the users decision. For example, if you set the language to English and close the application, the next time you open it, the user interface will be in English.
      Parameters:
      language - Language of the application
      country - Country of the application
